text: Jose Luis Violeta Lajusticia (25 February 1941 – 5 May 2022) was a Spanish footballer. He played as a midfielder for Real Zaragoza and the Spain national team. He made 14 appearances with the national team between 1966 until 1977. He was born in Zaragoza, Spain. Violeta died on 5 May 2022 in Zaragoza, at the age of 81. ==Honours== Zaragoza * Inter-Cities Fairs Cup: 1963–64 * Copa del Generalísimo: 1963–64, 1965–66 ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish footballers Category:People from Zaragoza
title: José Luis Violeta
